/*! ========================================================= * Paper Dashboard React - v1.3.0 ========================================================= * Product Page: https://www.creative-tim.com/product/paper-dashboard-react * Copyright 2021 Creative Tim (https://www.creative-tim.com) * Licensed under MIT (https://github.com/creativetimofficial/paper-dashboard-react/blob/main/LICENSE.md) * Coded by Creative Tim ========================================================= * The above copyright notice and this permission notice shall be included in all copies or substantial portions of the Software. */ import React, {useEffect, useState} from "react"; // react plugin used to create charts import {Bar, Line, Pie} from "react-chartjs-2"; // reactstrap components import { Card, CardHeader, CardBody, CardFooter, CardTitle, Row, Col, } from "reactstrap"; // core components import { dashboard24HoursPerformanceChart, dashboardEmailStatisticsChart, dashboardNASDAQChart, } from "variables/charts.js"; import table from "table"; import {Chart} from "chart.js"; import axios from "axios"; function Dashboard() { const [APIData, setAPIData] = useState([]); const [salles, setsalles] = useState([]); const [oc, setoc] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { axios.get(`http://localhost:3000/occupation/salles/a`) .then((response) => { setAPIData(response.data) console.log(APIData.map(e=>e.count.toString())); }) }, []) useEffect(() => { axios.get(`http://localhost:3000/salles/`) .then((response) => { setsalles(response.data) }) }, []) useEffect(() => { axios.get(`http://localhost:3000/occupation/salles/b`) .then((response) => { setoc(response.data) }) }, []) const config = { type: 'bar', data: { labels: salles.map(e=>e.salle.name.toString()), datasets: [{ label: 'My First Dataset', data: oc.map(e=>e.count.toString()), backgroundColor: [ 'rgba(255, 99, 132, 0.2)', 'rgba(255, 159, 64, 0.2)', 'rgba(255, 205, 86, 0.2)', 'rgba(75, 192, 192, 0.2)', 'rgba(54, 162, 235, 0.2)', 'rgba(153, 102, 255, 0.2)', 'rgba(201, 203, 207, 0.2)' ], borderColor: [ 'rgb(255, 99, 132)', 'rgb(255, 159, 64)', 'rgb(255, 205, 86)', 'rgb(75, 192, 192)', 'rgb(54, 162, 235)', 'rgb(153, 102, 255)', 'rgb(201, 203, 207)' ], borderWidth: 1 }] }, options: { scales: { y: { beginAtZero: true } } }, }; const test = { data: (canvas) => { return { labels: APIData.map(e=>e._id.toString()), datasets: [ { data: APIData.map(e=>parseInt(e.count)), fill: false, borderColor: "#fbc658", backgroundColor: "transparent", pointBorderColor: "#fbc658", pointRadius: 4, pointHoverRadius: 4, pointBorderWidth: 8, tension: 0.4, }, ], }; }, options: { plugins: { legend: { display: false }, }, }, }; return ( <>

); } export default Dashboard;
